summary: A High Quality 2K Noble Swords Set
descriptionHtml:
A High Quality 2K Noble Weapon Set by HXP ! 

This Mod will bring you 4 Weapons which can all be crafted at any Forge in the Game ! 


The Following Weapons can be achieved if you have the Daedra Smithing Perk !


1.Noble Daedra Greatsword - Red

2.Noble Imperial Greatsword - Blue

3.Noble Imperial Dagger - Light Blue

4.Dwarven 1H Sword - Blue/Green


All Weapons have a Glowing Dragon Language Code engraved which makes them also very Rare in the Game !

All Weapons glow at Night which can also produce a small Light when you are in dark areas such like Dungeons or Caves ! Of course they will not replace Torches or any other LIghts in the Game like Magic Light Spells or whatever



PLEASE ENDORSE THIS MOD IF YOU LIKE IT !



This Mod is also user friendly packed in BSA File Archive for a convinient Installation !

Unpack the Rar Files and then Simply Drop the Files into your Skyrim Data Directory !



If you are also a HD Texture Fan like me, maybe you are also interested in these Awesome HD Torches which you can find here - 
HD Torches 2k -  4K
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37831//?

If you want to test this Weapon Set and you dont have the Materials or dont have the Perks than this will help you ! Just use a new Save for testing and then go back to your old Savegame if you want to go back to normal - here is the File - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32465/?

If you have time you can also check my other work here !
Beautiful Galaxies 2K - 4K - 8K
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32644/?

Dawnguard HD 2K
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32809/?

Ice Wraith and Dragon Priest Retexture 4k - 2k
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32741/?

Deadpool Weapons Set 2K
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37826/?


and some more which I did not list here but you can find more of my Moddz via my Profile !

Anyway Enjoy !



Credits to Nexus and Bethesda Games of Course !

Credits to Nexus Modders Resource Packs since I have used some Textures from them ! (Only 2 or 3 - The Rest not )
Credits of Course to the Drawers of the Reference Pictures I have used to Model this Swords ( I did not 100% Follow the Reference Pictures and tweaked all the Models and gave them unique Design ) which I have found also by Google Pictures ! Every Picture and Texture was free to use so I have used them !
Thanks to all of you ! 
Download, Enjoy and Endorse !

HXP
author: HXP
